Title: The Hand of Death
Plot: A cemetery that's home to 80,000 dead souls becomes a "ghost magnet"; a family discovers that their new home is filled with the sounds of strange footsteps and whispered conversations; after a woman comes face-to-face with an apparition at her Kentucky farm, she sets to videotape her new ghostly friend; the spirits of children happily haunt an inn, playing pranks and giggling out loud; and angry entities force a couple out of their home.
